amendment.description: To provide that sums in the Thrift Savings Fund may not be invested in securities that are listed on certain foreign exchanges.

action.text: Amendment SA 523 under the order of 7/27/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 42. Record Vote Number: 210.

Amendment SA 523 proposed by Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 935. (consideration: CR S3726) To provide that sums in the Thrift Savings Fund may not be invested in securities that are listed on certain foreign exchanges.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 523 proposed by Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 935.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 523 under the order of 7/27/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 42. Record Vote Number: 210.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 523 under the order of 7/27/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 42. Record Vote Number: 210.
